tool_description: NFTsmaker.io its first API to fetch all data displayed of rarible NFTs marketplace
name: Rarible Data Scraper
title: Rarible Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get List of auctions
api_list.description: Of Rarible marketplace, you will found open Auctions display most NFT listed, current endpoint offer your this Data to fetch
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/auctions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Hot Bids
api_list.description: Of Rarible marketplace, you will found Hot Bids section display most NFT listed, current endpoint offer your this Data to fetch

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Top Collection
api_list.description:
**You can get the Top collection of Nfts by day and size selected:**
`for example you can get best or Top collection of curent day, or of last 7 day`

**Notice**: 'The maximum of size its 100'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/top_collection/1/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/top_collection/{day}/{size}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rarible-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
